title: Jellyfin Is Shit
content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Jellyfin 真是坨屎，用户都在骄傲什么？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"逆天的交互，赖于国内网络的各种问题，各种复杂的逻辑完全不能做到一劳永逸。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相反依赖客户端的 VidHub, 网易的 filmly 反而更有未来。"}]}]}
